alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:41AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Gulf and western Franklin Counties through 1045 AM EDT/945 AM CDT/... At 941 AM EDT/841 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Mexico Beach, or 12 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Franklin, Eleven Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Beverly, Milltown, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Simmons Bayou, Hays Place, Saint Joe Beach, Fort Gadsden and Nine Mile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
